a.style: font-family:"Playfair Display", Georgia, "Times New Roman", serif

text.tspan: Primary education spending as share of all education levels vs. Overall
education spending as share of all public spending sectors, 2017
Government expenditure on primary education as a share of overall government expenditure on education (Y-axis) vs.
Government expenditure on education as a share of total government expenditure (X-axis). Colors represent different world
regions. Observations correspond to 2017 data (or the year before/after if 2017 missing)
Share of education in government expenditure (% of government expenditure) in 2017
Expenditure on primary as % of government expenditure on
Source: World Bank, Population (Gapminder, HYDE(2016) & UN (2019))
